viewComponents.script: var s = '';if (value)  s += "<input type='button' value='DESLIGAR' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", false);return false;' />"; else s += "<input type='button' value='LIGAR' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", true);return true;' />"; return s;
